title: Learn to create your own non-toxic cleaning products on September 19th — Summit Chiropractic Center
description: Join us for this free event on September 19th at 6:15pm and learn how to create your own non-toxic cleaning products!You deserve a home environment that is safe, healthy, and non-toxic.You will receive: a step-by-step demonstration, recipes, and a free spray bottle!Sponsored by Summit Chiropractic C
